messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Rue & Ren
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/03 11:50:34 PM, marji@gaiawolf.org writes: ~Kelly, still waiting to hear from Ren!  I would like to see Ren. I have a fuzzy vision
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/03 11:50:34 PM, marji@... writes:

<< >~Kelly, still waiting to hear from Ren! >>

I would like to see Ren.
I have a fuzzy vision of her sitting in the hospital room, by the window,
with I don't even remember now one or two kids. Either two and one was climbing,
or one and who was climbing up and down and around.

I'm not on painkillers anymore and would kind like to meet Ren standing
upright.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Rue & Ren
messages.msgSnippet: ... Kelly, If I have to overshoot Columbia to drive down to Pensacola and pick Ren and the young uns up, Ren ll be there!  Liam asks about our old roomies at
messages.messageBody:
At 23:47 6/8/03 -0400, you wrote:
>In a message dated 6/7/2003 7:12:58 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
>Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
> > > Ren, I think I remember that we have the same bday too! I'm starting to
> > > hear twilight zone music... ~Rue
> >
> > I failed to remember that!! Whoa....this IS strange. I absolutely have to
> > meet you Rue!
> >
> > Ren
>
>Well, Ren,
>
>RUE will be at the conference. Her registration is all in---AND she's
>presenting a funshop!
>
>~Kelly, still waiting to hear from Ren!

Kelly, If I have to overshoot Columbia to drive down to Pensacola and pick
Ren and the young'uns up, Ren'll be there! Liam asks about our old roomies
at least every week. He wonders why we don't just go to their house
already. He's getting antsy with all this waiting! Me too!

Marji, spoken in a rather forceful, un-Marji-like way.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Rue & Ren
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/7/2003 7:12:58 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Well, Ren, RUE will be at the conference. Her registration is all in---AND she s presenting a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/7/2003 7:12:58 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> > Ren, I think I remember that we have the same bday too! I'm starting to
> > hear twilight zone music... ~Rue
>
> I failed to remember that!! Whoa....this IS strange. I absolutely have to
> meet you Rue!
>
> Ren

Well, Ren,

RUE will be at the conference. Her registration is all in---AND she's
presenting a funshop!

~Kelly, still waiting to hear from Ren!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
